4. Planning & Zoning Commission

Planning & Zoning Commission
============================

The Planning and Zoning Commission is responsible to and serves in an advisory capacity to the City Council on zoning matters, subdivisions, and platting requests.

The seven-member board is appointed by the City Council.

**COMMISSION MEMBERS:**

* PL1 - Patrick Gray
* PL2 - Rachel Huber
* PL3 - Sabrina Holmes
* PL4 - Alan Whittaker,***Chair***
* PL5 - Dani Muckleroy
* PL6 - Fred Hart, ***Vice*** ***Chair***
* PL7 - David Hinson

Commission Meetings

The Planning and Zoning Commission meets on the first Monday of every month at 6:00 pm as needed.  A fiscal year calendar of scheduled applicant submission deadlines, meetings and dates referred to Council is approved and set each year.

Meetings of the Planning and Zoning Commission are held in the Council Chamber room of the City Municipal Building. Located at 105 S. Cockrell Hill Road, Ovilla, TX 75154
